title: Half Watch Face
summary: Beautiful watch face for your android wear smartwatch
description: Half Watch Face is very simplistic but beautiful watch face for your android wear powered smartwatch.Watch Face supports round and square watches!Watch Face supports ambient mode!In Watch Face settings you can change to 24-hour format!In Watch Face settings you can add current date to the screen!In Watch Face settings you can change the color theme of the watch!
descriptionHTML:
Half Watch Face is very simplistic but beautiful watch face for your android wear powered smartwatch.
Watch Face supports round and square watches!
Watch Face supports ambient mode!
In Watch Face settings you can change to 24-hour format!
In Watch Face settings you can add current date to the screen!
In Watch Face settings you can change the color theme of the watch!
